Title: Authorizes the use of class one bicycles with electric assist on certain state lands that authorize the use of bicycles without electric assist
Summary: Authorizes the use of class one bicycles with electric assist on certain preserves, parks, and other state lands that the department of environmental conservation has authorized the use of bicycles without electric assist; provides that such class one e-bikes be authorized for such use in the same locations and manner as such bicycles without electric assist are authorized to be used.
LawCode: Amd ยง9-0105, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to authorizing class one bicycles with electric assist to be used on certain preserves, parks, and other state lands
